replies.body: so... bringing draft normals to OCE or what? i need to practice without versing the same 5 OP champs every game. we literally have an unfair disadvantage. the server is more than big enough now (which apparently was your excuse for removing it, 3 years ago)
give us a pbe while ur at it :P
Yes, please bring in draft normals for OCE!
Hey guys, come and join the largest discord server in the OCE region with over 1.4k members! https://discord.gg/2PdgYXA

finally! thanks riot!
{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
25 champs + plox {{summoner:3}}  {{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}}

Wooohoooo!!! 10 bans XD its like Christmas!

Not so fond of the fact that bans can be duplicated though.
Not only will it make you feel like your ban was worthless, but it also means theres more chance for cancer champs to slip through the cracks.
seriously man?

10 bans for normal..W hy? It will take longer, also some people wouldn't be able to play the champions they normally play, and the same champs would be banned all the time, and that isn't fun for the mains. It's exactly like ranked, I don't like it at all.{{sticker:zombie-nunu-bummed}}
It will take shorter because everyone does their ban all at once instead of one at a time.
Meh, it will suck though, always the same champions will be banned, it wont be fun anymore
Just play blind pick?

Thing is I want to rank up lol, but I honestly thought it was norms too.
But I didn't know, so meh.
If a champ is banned all the time, it means there is clearly something wrong with that champ.
I don't think it is normal bans because oce doesn't have any Normal DRAFT modes we have Normal BLIND but NA has draft.
there are no bans in normal in oce
GOOD
Can we have some dynamic icons plz？
spicy hehexd

What a stupid ban system, now totally meaningless.  There is zero effectiveness in this ban system as we are just banning champs we don't like without any tactical choice.  Please make it like pro bans 3 then 2 at least it is somewhat tactical then.  This feels like a real step backwards...

If we can't see who we are playing against we can't even make good ban choices based on their past performance. Why can't we see the other team like the pro obviously can??


Please change this system...
fake and gay
